name: lax-incense
effect: Held: Increases the holder’s Evasion by 5%.
short_effect: Held: Holder’s evasion is increased by 5%. Breeding: Wobbuffet begets a Wynaut Egg.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that slightly lowers the foe’s accuracy.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that slightly lowers the foe’s accuracy.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An item to be held by a POKéMON. Its tricky aroma slightly reduces the foe’s accuracy.
